fekanbrief.brief: FEKAN Howell & Associates is registered under business registration number BN- 8MC7RRGB to offer professional accounting and business advisory services focused on assisting business enterprises and organizations to thrive and grow to their purpose. Due to regulatory requirements, some of the consulting services are run through our associate, Howell Consulting Limited. We aspire to be the leading accounting firm offering audit, accountancy, and other financial and strategic management services. The firm’s clients include corporates and privately owned businesses as well as not-for-profit organizations and social enterprises. The firm offers services across a multitude of sectors including financial services manufacturing, energy, trading, agricultural, telecommunication, Not-for Profit, tourism, real estate & construction, County and National government Ministries, Departments and Agencies. We are dedicated to providing clients with exceptional value-adding and timely services. This commitment to being responsive keeps us connected and insightful in the business cycles of each of our clients.

corevalues.Professionalism: Courtesy, Honesty and Responsibility drives our business.

corevalues.Integrity: We believe business thrives in an ethical environment.
We value our clients as business partners.
We work together to achieve common goals.

principle-officers.CPA-Nicholas-Kathiari: is a partner at FEKAN Howell & Associates. He is a licensed practicing member of ICPAK, holding practice certificate number P/2523.  Nicholas is the Assurance leader and also coordinates our Corporate Finance Business. He has had a 23 years uninterrupted career in Ernst & Young, a big four accounting firm, where he rose from a trainee auditor to a Director in both assurance and advisory business service lines. Nicholas has solid experience in statutory audits and other assurance services in banking, insurance, Not-for-Profit Organizations, telecommunications utility and manufacturing sectors (including agro processing). He directed audit projects to ensure compliance with the International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS), International Standards on Auditing (ISA), firm’s audit methodology and relevant policies and laws and regulations; and client relationship management.

principle-officers.CPA-Felix-Kariuki: is partner at FEKAN Howell & Associates. He is a licensed practicing member of the Institute of Certified Public Accountants of Kenya (ICPAK) holding practice certificate number P/2526.  He has worked in audit at BDO, Ernst & Young and PSK & Associates to the level of an Associate Director. He had a 5-year experience as a CFO/Finance Director at Wananchi Business Services in between EY and PSK. He has a DNA of a client and a professional service provider. This blend makes him discern the urgency of a client’s service requirement with the responsive enthusiasm.

principle-officers.CPA-Patrick-Mwirigi: is a partner at FEKAN Howell & Associates. He is a practicing and licensed member of the Institute of Certified Public Accountants of Kenya (ICPAK) holding practice certificate number P/2137. He is a 2015 recipient of ICPAK’s Commendation Certificate for services rendered to the accountancy profession in Kenya. He began his audit career at PwC Kenya as an external auditor and proceeded to the corporate sector to head internal audit and risk functions in premium organizations; TPS Serena Group and Simba Corp Group until he ventured into private accounting practice. He had a stint as Regional Finance Manager at Sight Savers International in between PwC and Serena. He was the former Managing Partner of MPK & Associates, Certified Public Accountants.

introSummary.summary: Our Associates and staff comprise individuals with a rich skill set, who are qualified and experienced Certified Public Accountants (CPAs), Certified Internal Auditors, Information Communication and Technology experts (ICT), Certified Secretaries(CSs), Certified Investment and Financial Analysts (CIFA), Certified Fraud Examiners (CFEs),  Lawyers, Human Resource Professionals and trainers, with multidisciplinary  backgrounds ranging from Economics, Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, Actuarial Science and other social sciences.

serices.Title: Auditing and Assurance Related Services
serices.part1: FEKAN Howell & Associates offers partner-led statutory audit and assurance services. During an audit, we aim to gain a real understanding of your business and the quality and effectiveness of your accounting and control systems. This means we focus on the risks of material misstatements in the financial statements. In addition to an audit, a range of other assurance services can be tailored to your needs. These include:

part2.2: Limited reviews including agreed upon procedures

serices.part3: Our audit and assurance services are on a technology-based platform. We apply data analytical tools to discern and predict relationships on your business numbers/client data to mine useful insights. This keeps us connected and insightful for a measurable commitment to our clients.

serices.Title: Tax Services
serices.part1: Aware that businesses are operating in a very dynamic and complex tax environment, at FEKAN Howell, our professionals help clients navigate through the challenges and address their needs. We advise and support clients in planning, compliance, reporting and in this sustain constructive relationships with tax authorities. Our clientele includes corporates, public sector bodies, not-for-profit organizations and individuals. Our Tax Services include:

part2.1: Business Tax Planning and   Annual Tax Compliance
part2.4: Tax health checks review and planning

serices.part3: The above services are offered in the belief that tax obligations should be managed proactively and responsibly. This lays a foundation for sustainable growth.

serices.Title: Accounting Services
serices.part1: FEKAN Howell provides a full range of accounting and outsourcing services to help your business develop and grow both locally and regionally. A robust financial statement close process ensures timely and accurate financial information for strategic decision making. At FEKAN Howell we support our clients on this critical process. Our accounting services include:

part2.1: Preparation of financial statements in compliance with International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS), IPSAS and local Country GAAP or other GAAP
part2.2: Outsourced book-keeping and payroll using modern accounting packages/applications

serices.Title: Corporate Finance
serices.part1: The complexities of business acquisitions and disposals demand specialist advice from experienced professionals accustomed to local requirements. Our members can help you to manage and expand your operations. FEKAN Howell offers:

part2.1: Capital raising support – both equity and debt
part2.4: Structuring for partnerships and joint ventures

part2.2: IT related trainings; Data analytics and visualization

ourTeam.name: Partner - Nicholas Kathiari

From EY he left to form FEKAN Howell & Associates in August 2020. At FEKAN Howell, he leads assurance & corporate finance advisory assignments.

ourTeam.name: Partner – Felix Kariuki
